metadata.title: CVE-2024-35999 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb3:missing lock when picking channel Coverity spotted a place where we shouldhave been holding the channel lock when accessing the ses channel index.Addresses-Coverity: 1582039 ("Data race condition (MISSING_LOCK)")

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
